TopicTitle: Remove one letter from a movie title and describe the new movie in a single line

Articles.Content: Fly Bys - a movie containing an hour and thirty minutes of high speed low-altitude passes by various combat aircraft from around the world. (Fly Boys)
Finding Emo (finding nemo): about finding an emo person who got lost in despair
Staker: movie about guy who make stacks
G Blues - A musical movie about G-men who can't help breaking out into song with full band accompaniment by an invisible band. [GI Blues - Elvis Presley]
Inside UT: a documentary about students in the University of Texas and their daily lives.

Tetri: Plural of Tetris pieces. They must save the world from, uh, something.

Tetri II

Tetri III

Bac to the future: We send BAC9 to the future.

Tar trek: People try to walk through tar.

Star Rek: People GET REKT! In space.

Roboco: A company that makes robots.

Robcop: A cop named Rob.

Kerbal Pace Program: Something about pacing yourself.
Snaks on a plane: A thriller about the catering crew who forgot to load the snacks
Tar Wars: where angry people throw tar at each other.
Deadfool - About Deadpool's much more retarded, humorless and mortal cousin

The Ar of the Worlds: Space pirates, need I say more?

Edited July 2, 2016 by cubinator
Star Was: The story of a black hole's childhood

Holdfinger:  Where a spy holds a finger for the entire movie

Edited July 2, 2016 by Lo Var Lachland
The Ego Movie: Where all the characters have big egos
Mephisto Walt:  Disney does us all a favor and does NOT create cartoons; he instead decides to pursue his childhood dream of becoming a circus magician, albeit a second-rate one at best.

The Ride of Frankenstein 

A new amusement park opens in Transylvania, where one of the attractions is going for a ride on Frankenstein's Monster's shoulders. Hilarity and horror ensues.

Hostbusters- A movie about exposing the secret lives of game show hosts

Edited July 5, 2016 by AeroAviation
changed the word "documentary" to "movie"
STA Wars- STA-1s fight over the central hill on Mines (WoT players will know)

Finding Dor: An epic romance of a crazy hillbilly figuring out that he left his door wife at an aquarium, so he must find "her".

(Original title: Finding Dory)

(Also, I hate romance movies :P)

Edited July 6, 2016 by ProtoJeb21
Old ringo. A movie about an aging rock star as he tries to stay relevent whike all his peers are great grandfathers and lily-food.

Finding Dry: A mathematician, stranded in a lifeboat in the middle of the ocean, finds his way back to shore with a protractor, a bit of string, a small weight, a world map, and his wristwatch.

Edited July 6, 2016 by cubinator
Added the map and clock, now he can really get back with his...di-tant? Bitant? Haptant? I think it'd be a "bitant".
Fining Dory: Dory is caught jaywalking, and gets a minor fine.
Findig Dory: Some fish gets fined for digging in the ocean? Or does Dory find her inner mole?

Indian Jones: A western following the life-story of an adopted Indian called Jones by his adoptive parents.

Die Had: A professional gambler loses one of his lucky dice and becomes obsessed with finding it.

Battlesip: A bunch of extremely drunk friends get violent after a drinking game.

John Cater: After his adventures on Mars, John starts a new career in catering.

The Pa Riot: A bunch of dads start a riot.

Ineption: A comedy that follows the career of some extremely incompetent people that reach the top through sheer luck.

Kill ill: The story of a doctor dedicating her life to find a cure for her former boss and lover Bill, who suffers from a rare illness.

Rob Cop: A movie about a cop turned robber in Detroit.

Death Poof: a story about a homosexual stunt car driver.

Tax Driver: Police is in a high speed pursuit with a professional race car driver wanted for tax evasion.

Lick: A two hour movie about Adam Sandler sneaking into peoples houses and licking their remotes.
